page.title: 19EVERYDAY LIFE OF AN ADULT.
page.content: {CONTINUED FROM PAGE 18. I reach home at 6-15p.m.,have my tea and watch the news and tennis (from Wimbledon) on television until 7-30 p.m.Tonight is quiz night at Leeholme Working Men's Club.I go there with three of my friends,one of whom takes his car.There are 10 teams in the competition,and 4 people in each team. The entry fee is 25 pence per person. The questions vary enormously,and the quiz lasts roughly 2 hours.Tonight,our team wins by 3 points,the first prize being Â£8. We leave the Club at about 10-30p.m.,and I arrive home at 11-00 p.m. to watch 'Newsnight'_a news and current affairs television programme _ before I retire to bed.
